MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.00pm to safely repair faulty electrical equipment outside 30 William Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.43pm on the 16th of November 2020.
